query.table_data: SELECT a.acct_name, wpu.order_id, wpu.container_code, count(wpu.unit_serial) as quantity FROM wf_pack_unit wpu JOIN orders o on wpu.order_id = o.eid JOIN accounts a on o.vendor_id = a.eid GROUP BY a.acct_name, wpu.order_id, wpu.container_code ORDER BY wpu.order_id DESC

query.vendor_option: SELECT eid as acct_id, acct_name FROM accounts WHERE acct_type = 'vendor'

query.option_3: SELECT a.acct_name, wpu.order_id, wpu.container_code, count(wpu.unit_serial) as quantity FROM wf_pack_unit wpu JOIN orders o on wpu.order_id = o.eid JOIN accounts a on o.vendor_id = a.eid WHERE wpu.order_id in (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE vendor_id = %(vendor_id)s) AND wpu.order_id in (SELECT order_id FROM wf_pack_unit WHERE unit_serial LIKE %(search)s) GROUP BY a.acct_name, wpu.order_id, wpu.container_code ORDER BY wpu.order_id DESC;
